name: BasketAR
description: You want to throw a few threes but you could not go to the basketball court, you can bring the basketball ring to your home or wherever you go. BasketAR is the most enjoyable AR sports game in the market. You can challenge yourself or compete with friends in the ARcade mode, or beat creatively designed levels one by one and declare yourself as the Mr. Big Shot.
publishers: MIL YAZILIM BILISIM VE OYUN TEKNOLOJILERI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
